title: 28. Chris Thile & Brad Mehldau - Chris Thile & Brad Mehldau
text: by Das Boone The one available song (Gillian Welsh's Scarlet Town) is very cool. Is the itunes review all messed up? Wrong Album it seems - come on, get ot together. Consider it an investment... by Kauffie1 I saw them on CBS Saturday Morning playing "Don't Think Twice" and am preordering on the basis of that alone. I recomment that you do, too. Biography Born: February 20, 1981 in Oceanside, CA Genre: Country Years Active: '90s, '00s, '10s A new description of Chris Thile would be hard to come by, especially since all the good superlatives have already been used. They called him a child prodigy when he was 12 years old and making his first solo album, 1994's Leading Off..., and a virtuoso when he was 20 and putting out his third solo effort, 2001's Not All Who Wander Are Lost. On the heels of those descriptions came effusive adjectives for his talent with a mandolin, words like "brilliant," "bold," "utterly fantastic," and "staggering."... Top Albums and Songs by Chris Thile 1.
